infos.title: Deranged Dragon
infos.characteristics: As [Deathly Dragon] state increases Tersio's DMG dealt to enemies and his Crit Chance, you must dispel it. [Death's Door] constantly deals massive M.DMG and increases M.DMG the target takes. Since it becomes irremovable upon reaching the max number of stacks, it must be dispeled regularly. Also, when Tersio takes a certain amount of DMG, [Power of Hatred] is activated and he soars to the sky after a while to annihilate all enemies. Use CC Skills to reduce [Power of Hatred] and stop Tersio from using the Skill.

1.name: Deathly Dragon's Breath
1.description: Deals M.DMG to all enemies and inflicts Stun. Afterward, leaves [Deathly Dragon's Fire] on the ground that lasts for 5 sec. [Deathly Dragon's Fire] destroys the target's Shield and deals M.DMG that ignores Block each hit.

2.name: Overwhelming Annihilation
2.description: Concentrates power for a while and fires a ray to frontal enemies in a straight line for 3 sec, dealing M.DMG. This Skill reduces the target's Mana by 250 each hit and inflicts knockback. The farther the target is, the greater the DMG.

3.name: Death's Door
3.description: Tersio summons spectral Dragons for 8 sec by opening a gateway to hell. Spectral Dragons attack enemies to deal M.DMG and increase M.DMG the hit targets take by 5%. The M.DMG Boost effect can be stacked up to max 15 times. Upon reaching the max number of stacks, the M.DMG Boost effect becomes irremovable.

4.name: Incarnation of Hell
4.description: When Tersio's HP reaches 33%. [Power of Hatred] becomes activated and Tersio concentrates all of his power for 8 sec to fly. If his enemies fail to deplete [Power of Hatred] during the time of conentration, Tersio soars to the sky and annihilates all his enemies. Use CC Skills to reduce [Power of Hatred]

5.name: Lost Self
5.description: At the beginning of the first battle and every 15 sec, Tersio enters into the [Deathly Dragon] state. During the [Deathly Dragon] state, increases Crit Chance by 400 and DMG dealt to enemies by 50%.

6.name: Complete Form
6.description: Tersio is not affected by changes in ATK Spd, DEF and ATK. His All Crit Resistance is increased by 1000 and his attacks always hit.

7.name: Firstborn
7.description: Tersio's normal attacks deal M.DMG to the target's nearby enemies, and the hit target deals 4% reduced DMG to enemies. This effect can be stacked up max 20 times and is irremovable.

8.name: Hauled Into Hell
8.description: Every 15 sec, deals M.DMG to 1 enemy with the highest M.DEF to remove from battle for 8 sec and inflict [Infernal Curse]. The [Infernal Curse] effect can be stacked up to max 10 times. Each stack reduces the target's Mana Recovery by 100 and ATK Spd by 100. This effect is irremovable.
